Text: Thomson Financial Client Services Returns to Broadway OfficeTo our valued Thomson Financial clients We are pleased to announce that as of Monday October Thomson Financials Client Services Team has returned to our downtown New York City office located at Broadway For Client Services help with any of our products please call tollfree in the USCanada or for help with SDC Platinum Research Bank Web ShareWorld Prism and VentureXpert tollfree in the USCanada or for help with Global Access Edgar Direct PiranhaWeb Global Access Pro and CD Products such as Compact D Please note that although our tollfree numbers have NOT changed clients calling from countries outside North America should now dial or to reach the US Client Services team directly We look forward to working with you to ensure continued growth for the global financial community Thank you You are receiving this message because you have asked that we notify you of any news about Thomson Financial TF and its products and services If you do not want to receive future messages from Thomson Financial please follow the directions below To unsubscribe mailto or if the email address is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
